FuncDef:
The dot1x mc-trigger enables multicast-triggered 802.1X authentication.
The undo dot1x mc-trigger disables multicast-triggered 802.1X authentication. The dot1x mc-trigger enables multicast-triggered 802.1X authentication. The undo dot1x mc-trigger disables multicast-triggered 802.1X authentication. By default, multicast-triggered 802.1X authentication is enabled. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.
